text: I’m so excited to see you!
Thank you for agreeing to come along with me on such a short notice!
You see~ my friend Darwin said that he needs help watching over the Jungle kingdom while the King is away.
Prince Julius has been put in charge all by himself~ and needs as much help as he can get!
I know how reliable you are~ friend~ that's why I'm so happy you agreed to come along with us!
Plus~ this jungle is full of exciting games so I know that we’ll have so much fun!
Let's find our way to Jungle Island Explorer!
Start the engine by pressing the blue button.
Now let's look for the island.
To do that turn the steering wheel until you spot the island.
I know you can do it Explorer!
Let’s make sure this is Jungle Island!
Move the picture of the island to the outline.
Now~ move the throttle up to drive us to the Island!
If so say Aye Aye Captain!
Hmm.. it seems that your microphone is broken Explorer.
Press the microphone button to continue.
Good Job! I am too! Now honk the horn to let the boathouse know that we’re here Explorer!
We still have work to do on the island!
It wouldn't hurt to go on a little boat ride.
Do you want to go on another boat ride Explorer?
Then we better get back to the task at hand~ Explorer!
Thank you for the boat ride!
It’s nice to take a break once and a while.
When you're ready~ come on out so we can get back to work.
Do you want to go on another boat ride Explorer?
Then would you like to play on the ship?
Just come on out when you’re ready!
Then we better get back to the task at hand~ Explorer!
Welcome to the Jungle kingdom Explorer!
I’m so excited to learn and help out my friend!
I can't wait for you to meet him!
Oh! There he is up ahead!
and I absolutely love making stickers!
I see you’ve got some coins!
I'll tell you what~ if you give me three coins I’ll make you a one of a kind sticker!
I promise you won't find another kind like it!
Why don't we try for one now!
Alright! Here you go! Now drag your sticker to the board to place it!
You can only place your sticker once~ so when you hit yes~
Now if you ever run out of space you can remove stickers!
However! Once you remove a sticker you can't get it back.
If you ever want to place your stickers or view your collection~
call for me again and click the stickerboard!
If you have the funds you can also buy more boards to place your stickers on!
I have MANY cool boards from my travels! so help yourself!
so call me with the cart button if you ever need me again!
Hold your stickers there Explorer! You’re all out of inventory space.
Why don't you place some stickers or buy more boards to make room before you try to roll again!
Hmm~ a mighty fine sticker indeed!
A cute little thing! Can’t wait to make more for yah!
That’s a pretty cool sticker Explorer!
I’m pretty proud of this one Explorer!
I've never made a sticker like this one!
Not often do my stickers come out like this
Take care of this one Explorer~ it’s a rare one!
I’ve never made a cutie like this before!
Are you ready for me to make you a mighty fine sticker?!
I’m excited to get started on your sticker Explorer!
Let’s see what sticker you’ll get!
I’ll whip up something good~ Geckos honor!
Wait here! I’ll make a cute sticker in no time!
I’ll be here when you decide to come back!
Come back when you’re in need of a cute sticker ya hear!
Show them who is in charge!
I'll be generous and let you challenge me again.
Show them who is in charge!
I'll be fair and let you challenge me again.
These commoners don’t deserve your fairness~ your highness!
Show them who is in charge!
are you ready to challenge me again?
Hey… you ready to try again?
Okay... let’s just get this over with.
You won't be able to beat my friends.
Are you ready to lose Explorer!?
Come back when you're ready for my victory!
ARGH! How do you keep beating me!
Well I bet you can’t beat Marcus!
Are you ready to lose Explorer!?
Come back when you're ready for my victory!
I should have known I’d have to handle this myself!
Come at me Explorer~ you ready to lose?
Come back when you're ready for my victory!
Time for me to beat you I guess…
Time for me to beat you I guess…
Well would you look at that…
It looks like I win Explorer…
Well would you look at that…
It looks like I win Explorer…
You want to challenge me again?
You want to challenge me again?!
Grrr I’ll get you this time!
Ugh~ why’d you call me then!
You want to challenge me again?!
Didn’t you embarrass me enough already?
You want to challenge me again?
Why can’t you just leave me alone…
TIME FOR A ROYAL RUMBLE (tiger roar)
Looks like you’ll need a real challenge.
You really are good at this!
Don’t worry~ I’ll have a better challenge next time
Grrr I need to think of something even harder.
That was still too easy for you?
Hmph~ looks like you still need some more practice.
Just keep practicing some more~ I’ll be back to challenge you again~
I’ll see you in our next battle!
TIME FOR A ROYAL RUMBLE (monkey sounds)
Julius wasn’t being hard ENOUGH on you~ you’re too good at cleaning up our messes!
Looks like it’s up to us to challenge you!
You’ll ruin our fun by cleaning up so fast!
Yeah~ looks like we have to make this more… interesting!
What!? You beat us!? Impossible! Let’s get out of here!
Hehe you beat us… not that I’m shocked.
UGH let’s just get out of here!!
No Way! That was still too easy for you?
Yawn… let’s head out. See you soon Explorer
Hello Darwin! It’s been a while!
Hi there Red! It’s good to see you!
see you have others with you.
And this here is the Explorer! They’re super smart and can't wait to help and learn!
Hi to the both of you! As Red said earlier my name is
You see… I used to be the King's most trusted….
However… Adventure was calling my name and I just had to see what’s out there!
Red was saying earlier that the King is away? Why is that?
Yes yes the King is away to…
The King went out to help another kingdom in need!
How silly of me to forget.
I even remember when he had Julius!
I can’t wait to see him again!
I don’t know if I can do this guys...
I’m a bit nervous to run this kingdom on my own…
But there's some perks to that though…
Since you are the future King you can do anything you want! Haha!
The whole kingdom is yours to do as you please…
You can do anything your little heart desires my Prince!
Yes~ anything you want...take your frustration and nerves out on this village…
This is what you're supposed to do...
This is your playground my Prince!
I can do as I want!
Why did you do this~ Julius?
And I can do what I want!
Which means I can do what I want!
If this is the Prince we’re supposed to help
I wonder what's gotten into him...
He’s always been a… little... troublemaker...
But he’s never acted out like…
So this type of behavior is new for him?
Then we must catch up to him and figure out what’s wrong!
Darwin~ you know the Prince the most.
Can you think of anything that’ll help him?
Perhaps Julius has forgotten about how good he really is…
Then maybe you can help him remember!
I can’t seem to remember anything specific…
With this mess I can’t seem to think straight!
My friends and I can clean up while you think on things!
Besides~ we shouldn't leave things messy anyway!
I’ll leave it to you guys!
Maybe we’ll learn things while doing so!

column1: //Darwin STAYS onscreen from the last part and now moves to the middle to talk to the player.

text: Let me help you navigate the area.
tap on me when you're ready!
Hey wait! Not so fast Explorer.
Come talk to me so I can... uhh...
prepare you for the challenges you’ll face!
Are you ready to get started~ Explorer?
come back when you are ready.
Hmm… I can’t seem to remember…
I’m sure I’ll think of something soon Explorer…
Wow! Look at all the coins you received!
Tap on it and let's see what happens!
I think there’s someone you still need to meet before can we move forward...
Can’t believe how good it looks!
Does this mean you’re getting your memories back? Will they be able to help the Prince?
It’s been so long that it makes remembering harder…
But with the village being all cleaned up it’s making it easier!
I’m going to run up ahead and try to catch up to Julius!
I see Darwin isn't with you.
He went on ahead to look for you.
You guys are getting in the way.
One of you will step up and accept my challenge.
you can move forward and bother me some more.
We have no choice but to accept.
The Explorer will be the one to challenge you.
They have been learning so much!
It’s time to put what you've learned to the test!
HOW DARE YOU DO THIS TO THE FUTURE KING!
How dare you win fair and square…
I knew you could do it!
Next time you won't be so lucky!
I don't know why he’s acting this way.
I’m sure we’ll find out in time.

column1: // this ones a wild one. Visually I'd like the bg to undim but bars stay in place after the last segment so they we can watch the tiger sign post spring in place. Then the bg dims for talkies again but the sign stays OVER the dim so it's in focus letting Red speak on the left as if to look at it.

text: If you tap on it~ you can probably play the Princes challenge games!
You should try it when you want to practice your skills!
I think you should consider using it~ Explorer
It looks like they destroyed this area as well.
Let’s clean up before moving forward!
I told you we’d see each other again soon.
The challenge is about to begin!
you can keep getting in my way and move forward.
you have to leave me alone~ and let me do what I want!
It seems we don't have another choice.
Show them what you're made of!
I knew you could do it!
You won't beat me next time! I promise!
let's move forward and find Darwin!
Hopefully he’s thought of something to help the Prince.
I agree~ let's hope he does.
It looks like they destroyed this area as well...
Let's go over and talk to him.
and now I come back to my village in shambles.
W-wait! That wasn't us! It was-
Listen~ I don't want to hear it.
Clean this mess up then I'll listen to you
We were already planning on it sir!
Well it’s a pleasure to meet you Clogg!
My name is Red and this is Wally!
They did most of the work!
I thank you for cleaning my Village~
Now~ you can tell me what you were trying to say earlier.
we came to your kingdom to help the Prince while the King is away.
Unfortunately~ he’s destroying everything around him.
But~ our friend Darwin is up ahead of us!
He used to be the King's advisor.
We’re hoping he is able to come up with something to stop the Prince's behavior.
That doesn't sound like Prince Julius.
Sure he has some spunk to him~ but he'd never -
I see you were able to put the village back together again.
You have no right to speak to the future King!
No right to speak after being spoken to.
What is the meaning of this!?
The future King is simply doing what he is allowed to do!
Do not lecture your future King!
you can keep getting in my way and move forward.
you have to leave me alone and let me do what I want!
Show the Prince all that you've learned!
I knew you could do it!
How dare you make a monkey of the future King!
I’m sure we’ll see them again soon.
I see… So it really was the Prince.
It does seem a bit strange that a Prince would do this to their own kingdom.
It makes me worry for the future of this kingdom.
Maybe it might be best if the tigers weren't rulers anymore.
We’re on a mission to help the Prince~ and stop this!
I guess only time will tell.
Thank you for fixing my village.
You may come and go as you please.
I just started remembering all of the good times I had here~
and I just couldn't stop myself!
That’s at least good to hear! All that matters is that we found you again.
Well umm if it means anything…
Taking that walk has reminded me of so many things that the Prince did when he was a cub!
remind him of the good heart he has!
Listen Julius~ you don't have to do this…
You have no right to speak to the Prince!
This is my kingdom! I can do as I please!
I don’t need you to lecture me!
At least listen to what Darwin has to say!
do you remember when you were little and there was a festival in the Gorilla Village?
The village was getting all decorated~
but there weren't enough villagers to help.
And you took it upon yourself to help put the streamers up?
To help the villagers in your kingdom?
I must say that just because you helped out those commoners~
doesn't mean you can’t do as you want!
You helped them because you wanted to~
but you can do whatever you want to their silly little village because you can!
They should be grateful that you even paid that village any attention at all!
Hey now! That’s not very nice!
This is my kingdom! I can do whatever I want!
Silence! It doesn't matter what you think!
IT DOESN'T MATTER! THIS IS MY KINGDOM!
There’s no use getting worked up over it.
The best we can do is to keep moving forward.
you’re right Wally. I just wish we could help him.
It seems like he doesn't have good role models for friends.
Let's start by getting this cleaned up.
Let's get this place all cleaned up!
my name is Darwin! And these are my friends…
This is our friend~ they're an Explorer!
Are you alright Spindle? What happened?
I heard shouting so I came over to see what was going on.
I guess I got caught in the destruction...
Is there anything we can do to help?
and I can help clean up this place and patch you up!
Yeah! Sounds like a good plan!
It looks like your story got to Julius a little bit!
Would you be able to think of more stories to tell?
But with this mess it’s hard to jog my memory…
You think of stories while we clean up and help Spindle!
Would you r-really do that for me?
You rest while we take care of everything.
I’ll... uh... go think some more...
Do you want to play some more?
…Sorry… you startled me for a second.
N-nice to see you again friend!
Do you want to practice some more?
It looks amazing! I also feel so much better!
T-thank you so much for your help!
I'm so glad we could help you feel better~ Spindle!
Have you thought of any stories~ Darwin?
I need to look up ahead to find Julius!
We’ll just have to catch up to him eventually..
I won't keep y-you here much longer!
G-go catch up to your friend!
It seems you’ve cleaned up my mess yet again.
He wasn't speaking to you~ commoner!
Hey! It’s not nice to speak to people like that!
It doesn't matter! You know what’s next!
you can keep getting in my way and move forward.
you have to leave me alone and let me do what I want!
Yeah! This time he’ll beat you for sure!
You’ve got this Explorer! I believe in you!
I knew you could do it!
Whatever! I’ll get you next time!
You won’t be so lucky next time!
I-I never thought that the Prince would act this way…
Try to not worry so much.
Yeah! We’re going to help the Prince just wait and see!
It’s good to see you~ Clogg!
It seems the unruly Prince is at it again.
but we’re trying to find a way to stop him.
would you be able to help me clean up this camp as well?
that was a lot of hard work!
It was no trouble at all-
You should just leave the Prince alone!
And let him do as he pleases!
Ruining your subject's home's just isn’t right!
Everything in the future King's kingdom is his!
These commoners should be thankful they even get to live here!
You don’t have to add onto everything I say!
You know how it goes already!
Beat me and you can go forward.
you have to leave me alone!
You’ve got this Explorer! We believe in you!
He is the future King! How dare you make him look bad!
because losing is what’s making him look bad.
Good job Explorer! I’m proud of you!
Next time we’ll beat you chumps!
I feel like we’ve gotten through to him a little bit!
thank you for helping me clean up again.
Alright! Let's be on our way!
It looks like some monkeys were uhhh...
Well whatever it was it reeks.
Let's clean this up and be on our way.
I'm glad that was taken care of.
Yeah… It still kinda smells though…
Yeah I agree~ Let's get out of here-
UGh! Let's get this over with!
If you win you can go on ahead.
Okay Explorer let's hurry up and do this…
You know what~ I don't even have anything to say.
It smells awful~ let's just move on ahead.
Hopefully in a better smelling place…
Now let's move on to better smelling areas
And it smells so great too!
You have to stop running off on us!
But! If it makes you feel better!
I thought of another story to help Julius!
I see Darwin is back yet again.
You need to stop what you’re doing. It isn’t what Princes~
or even future Kings~ should be doing.
the old King's advisor would know nothing about being a King…
at least listen to him your highness.
Remember when you were small~ and we went on an adventure through the Spider Forest?
Remember when we found a little lost spider?
And she couldn’t remember where her web was?
I remember you picking her up with your little paws~
and went to every web you could find until you found her web!
I remember her mom was so worried about her!
You know~ your parents and I were so proud of you Julius.
stop this madness. This isn’t the Prince I know!
Just because you helped that commoner~ doesn’t mean anything!
We know you better than anyone here! We know what you can do!
We’re your real friends~ your highness…
No Darwin! They’re my friends! They know what’s best for me!
That’s right! We know what’s best!
And I thought we were getting through to him…
It seems like Darwin got to him a little bit.
Maybe if he tells the Prince more stories~ he’ll come around.
Do you think you can remember more stories?
But as always~ the mess isn't helping my memory.
Sit back~ and we’ll clean this mess up.
Don’t worry Darwin! We’ll clean this up in no time!
Bubble bubble bubble! Gurgle Borp Bubble!
Bubble bubble bubble! Gurgle Borp Bubble!
While we can’t fully understand you~ I can at least tell you’re injured
And that’s where we come in!
My friends and I will help patch you up~ and clean up your space!
Darwin~ you keep trying to come up with stories to help Julius.
Red~ the Explorer~ and I will clean this place up and help Bubbles.
We'll take that as a yes.
Think of any stories to tell the Prince?
I can’t wait to tell him!
Come on gang! Let’s go find him!
At any rate we should catch up to him!
I see Darwin just keeps running off.
Of course he does your majesty!
Yeah who would wanna leave like that…
That’s so mean! He just left to find you!
That air head! He's never around when you need him!
If you beat me you can move forward.
If you don’t then you have to leave me alone.
Next time I’ll win you'll see!
I hope we can help him soon.
Don’t worry Bubbles~ we’ll help your Prince out!
He’ll stop being destructive in no time!
I’ve never seen a pirate ship before!
Hmm… It seems to be in rough shape.
Do you think the Prince did this?
However~ this ship looks like it's been falling apart for a while now.
True~ it does look that way.
I -I don’t k-know… It all happened so f-fast… so fast...
Don’t worry~ We’re going to get you and your ship all patched up okay?
H-help m-me p-please… help me please…
P-play some m-more? Play some more…
And maybe help me to your coins!
Oh I’m feeling a bit better!
However~ I think some coins will help me feel much better!
You weren’t really hurt were you?
You just wanted the Explorers' coins.
Why would you do such a thing like that?!
I’m a pirate~ I like coins.
After my ship got damaged~ I needed more coins to fix it up so I could sail the open seas again. Seas again!
You could have just asked us.
What you did isn’t nice Ollie.
It’s okay to ask for help.
That’s right~ honesty is key. Deceiving people~
especially those who wish to help~
It’s okay! I accept your apology.
Does that mean you’ll give me your coins?!
I see you fixed up this old run down ship.
That sad ship hasn't been out on the ocean in years!
Don't talk about my beautiful ship that way!
Silence commoner! How dare you act this way in front of the future King!
He has every right to talk down on your sad~ silly little ship!
It’s not nice to speak that way to people!
Why would you let someone speak that way to one of your subjects!?
How many times do we have to tell you that the Prince can do as he pleases!
And since we are his friends~ we can do the same!
I don't have time to be dealing with this right now!  You know what I'm here for!
If you win you can go on ahead.
I knew you could do it!
I'll win soon! I promise you!
He’s a handful that’s for sure.
We’re trying to remind the Prince to do what’s right!
Yeah~ put your faith in us.
In any case~ thank you for helping me and my ship!
Please stop running off without us!
when you run off like that it makes us worry!
I did it again~ did I?!
I’m so sorry my friends! I’ll try to not run off in the future.
We'll see~ thank you for apologizing!
have you thought of any new stories to tell the Prince?
Yes of course! I wouldn’t have run off on you if I didn’t!
What story did you think of this time?
I guess we finally caught up to each other.
I was looking everywhere for you Julius!
Do you mind me telling you another story?
You’re wasting the Princes’ time and energy! We do NOT need any more of your stories
Leave the Prince alone and get out of our way!
Even though we were the ones bothering you…
This is incredibly rude of you.
Do you remember when you were just a small cub~
and we were playing by the ocean next to the Clifftops?
And do you remember that poor little octopus who was tangled up in the plastic litter?
I don’t know how people can throw things into the ocean~ with no regard to the animals that live there.
But I remember that when you saw that poor octopus.
You didn't hesitate to rush in and save him. I remember you spent hours trying to untangle him until you finally did it.
I was so proud of you!
I don’t know why you’re so proud of me.
The Julius I remember has a good heart and the most compassionate roar.
And I know one day~ THAT Julius will be an excellent King.
Your highness~ I am so tired of hearing these useless stories! I don’t understand!
It doesn’t change the fact that you can do whatever you want!
Stop filling his head with this! It isn’t right!
I~ am his friend~ and I~ know him best!  I~ know what he can and can't do!
Get out of my head! Just leave me alone!
Just give up already! Make like a tree and uh~ get outta here!
I don’t think that’s how it goes…
I know he just destroyed this area~ but It seems like we’re getting through to him.
Don’t just stand there help uuuussss!
Celeste and I heard some yelling and so we swam up to investigate~
and I guess we just got caught up in it.
Whatevaaa~ I just don’t feel well.
I don’t feel so good either…
Don’t worry~ my friends and I will patch you up! You’ll be all good as new!
We’ll clean up as well~ just rest.
Of course! Just leave it to us!
Do you think you’ll be able to think of more stories while we clean up?
Keep it up Explorer! I believe in you!
Oh.. uhh.. Hey Explorer! I’m okay~ thanks for checking on me.
Can’t believe they trashed the ocean or whateva!
Ugh this trash stinks~ please hurry up and help us clean it!
It’s like~ not good to put plastic in the ocean or whateva!
Hey Explorer! Wanna come in for a swim? The water’s great!
Did you come to enjoy the sun too? I’m getting my like~ tan on!
I love hanging out with friends or whateva~ but especially with Sylvie!
The water’s always better with you Celeste!
Yeah! Like thank you or whatevaa.
I'm so glad we were able to help!
have you thought of any stories to tell?
Now don’t go running off on us-
I'm so excited! I just have to go find Julius!
I don’t know what we were expecting.
I'm so glad we could help you guys!
I don’t know what we would do without you!
I just wish we knew why the Prince would do such a thing…
Yuh! It’s seriously concerning or whatevva.
But I feel like we’re getting through to him. He was a lot worse before~ believe it or not.
Worse or not~ thank you for helping or whatever~ seriously.
It makes my blood boil knowing what the Prince did to Sylvie!
We’re both alright now~ and that’s all that matters to me...
I'm just happy you guys were able to fix everything! It was a mess!
I'm just glad everything worked out okay!
Cleaning up the Princes’ mess like a commoner would!
He shouldn’t be making those messes in the first place!
He can do whatever he wants! He is the future King!
I’ve got a bone to pick with you!
How dare you do that to the Ocean!
How dare you put Sylvie in any danger!
If I could climb across this beach I’d-
which is a principle the Prince should know.
Julius may do whatever he pleases!
Quit complaining~ and be grateful that you live in the seas of the future King!
Your comments are starting to get old!
I don't have time for this…
It’s time for our challenge Explorer!
If you win you can continue on.
you have to leave me alone.
Show this Prince that his actions have consequences!
I kind of saw it coming…
I knew you could do it!
The future King will win soon enough!
You're just shellfish of my good jokes...
That Prince was lucky he left so soon.
With the way he handled Sylvie…
I’m just glad that that’s over with.
with him being the future King~ his actions are quite concerning…
But it looks like we’re starting to reach him!
Yeah~ we’re not going to let the Prince hurt any more creatures.
We have a plan to bring the Prince back to the good side!
The esteemed Baron Ulysses Billiam Bastian~
He wished to tell you that you have his high favor since he couldn’t tell you himself.
He also goes by like~ Bubbles or whatever for short.
It was no trouble at all!
We’re always happy to help a friend in need!
well you’re welcome to come back anytime!
All right gang! Let’s move out!
I’ve never seen ruins like this before!
It’s a shame that the Prince messed with this landmark.
Well it’s never a good idea to mess with historical sights~ but we can definitely pick up after ourselves.
So let’s clean up the Prince's mess.
We have some cleaning and learning to do!
I wish you guys would just leave me alone…
Why can’t you all just leave the Prince be!
He’s allowed to do as he pleases!
You can’t just do whatever you want! It’s not right to treat people like this!
This isn’t right and you know it.
You know what you came here to do!
Don’t let these commoners distract you.
You know why I’m here so let’s get on with it!
If I lose you can go forward.
If I win you have to leave me alone.
Show the Prince what you’ve got!
How dare you do this to your King!
Well… technically they’re not from here so Julius isn’t their king….
I don’t understand what’s so hard about leaving me alone!
Not like how we ruined these ruins...
gRRR! You better watch it~ Brutus!
I’m really proud of you Explorer!
You’re never going to stop running off are you.
No~ I don't think he is…
Well I can’t say that we’re surprised.
At this point we've accepted it.
Well…I uhh.. Thought of another story to tell Julius!
What story did you think up this time?
Anything the Prince does is none of your business!
Do you remember when I was teaching you about the creatures in the ocean?
Do you remember when my lesson took us to Mermaid Rocks?
I remember the mermaids came over to show us the different types of critters and plants that lived there!
Do you remember when one of the mermaids lost one of their combs in the sand?
I remember you searching for hours until you finally found that comb!
By the time you found it~ the sun was already setting.
And I was so proud of you!
*chuckle* Even though my lesson plan was ruined.
That’s how I know this isn't you.
Your highness~ none of this even matters!
Your highness~ all he’s doing is telling you how you were in the past.
We’re your REAL friends now. WE know you best!
That’s no way to talk to someone!
